entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
